article.description: Nick Griffin hit five 3-pointers and scored 22 and Elijah Gonzales added 15 points and nine assists to power Saint Peter's to an 84-58 victory over Quinnipiac on Sunday.
article.headline: Saint Peter's rolls to 84-58 victory over Quinnipiac
article.linkText: Saint Peter's rolls to 84-58 victory over Quinnipiac
article.story: JERSEY CITY, N.J. -- Nick Griffin hit five 3-pointers and scored 22 and Elijah Gonzales added 15 points and nine assists to power Saint Peter's to an 84-58 victory over Quinnipiac on Sunday. Nnamdi Enechionyia also had 15 points and Samuel Idowu scored 10 for the Peacocks (8-7, 2-2 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference). Enechionyia knocked down 3 of 5 from 3-point range as Saint Peter's shot 57 percent from long range and 61.5 percent overall. Davauhnte Turner had four of the Peacocks' 10 steals. Cameron Young scored 18 to pace the Bobcats (5-11, 2-2), while Chaise Daniels chipped in with 16 points and five rebounds. Quinnipiac made just 16 of 55 shots (29 percent), including 9 of 34 from beyond the arc (26.5 percent). Quinnipiac led just once, 3-2, on Young's 3-pointer in the first minute. Idowu's bucket regained the lead for the Peacocks and they upped their advantage to 43-28 by halftime. Saint Peter's is 5-0 at the Yanitelli Center, improving its best start at home in 21 years.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
